comments:
Using I1019, I loaded org.eclipse.osgi from dev.eclipse.org. I used the PDE
tools to get the dependencies. Once the view was opened, I tried to double-click
on the plugin.
I got:
java.lang.NullPointerException
at
org.eclipse.pde.internal.ui.editor.plugin.ManifestEditor.openPluginEditor(Unknown

Fixed.
The problem was occurring because org.eclipse.osgi does not have a plugin.xml.
